synopsis.text:
Shujin Academy's new student, Ren Amamiya, finds his life taking a dramatic turn after transferring to Tokyo. Upon arriving, he discovers a mysterious app on his phone that introduces him to the Metaverse, a realm filled with distorted shadows of people's true selves. In this world, he awakens his Persona, an extraordinary power that allows him to battle these shadows and change their hearts.

Together with a group of fellow students who share the same ability, Ren forms the Phantom Thieves of Hearts. Their mission: to combat the corruption and injustice they see in their daily lives by reforming the hearts of those responsible. As they navigate the challenges of high school by day and their crime-fighting escapades by night, the Phantom Thieves become a beacon of hope for those suffering under the oppressive system.

However, their newfound fame attracts both admiration and scrutiny. When Ren is captured and interrogated about the group's activities, he must convince Sae Niijima, a relentless prosecutor, of their noble intentions. Will she understand their cause, and what will become of the Phantom Thieves and their quest for justice? This thrilling tale of personal growth, friendship, and rebellion unfolds in the bustling city of Tokyo.
